profile_summary:
As a proficient Senior Salesforce Engineer, I bring 8 years of full-stack development experience with a strong technical focus on **Salesforce Marketing Cloud**, **SQL**, and **Amscript**. My capabilities extend to implementing **Automation Studio** and **Email Studio**, optimizing processes, and developing custom solutions to enhance performance. I have a proven track record in **Journey Builder**, delivering personalized customer experiences through data-driven strategies and process optimization.
Additionally, I excel in Scripting and performance analysis, fostering collaboration across cross-functional teams to ensure continuous improvement and the successful execution of projects.
